name: proofpoint-trap
label: Proofpoint TRAP
description: Perform actions like Get incident details, Retrieve incidents, Close Incidents and Create Alert from JSON source using Proofpoint TRAP

fields.title: Server Address
fields.name: server_address
fields.description: URL of the Proofpoint TRAP server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: URL of the Proofpoint TRAP server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: aPIToken
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Token that you have generated in Proofpoint TRAP application
fields.description: Specify the API Token that you have generated in Proofpoint TRAP application

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Create Alert from JSON Source
operations.description: Creates ProofPoint Alert based on Alert Source ID and other parameters provided

parameters.title: Alert Source ID
parameters.name: alertSourceID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Alert Source ID of which you want to create the alert
parameters.description: Specify the Alert Source ID of which you want to create the alert

parameters.title: Data
parameters.name: data
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Alert Data of which you want to create the alert
parameters.description: Specify the Alert Data of which you want to create the alert

operations.title: Get Incident Details
operations.description: Retrieves incident details based on the incident ID and other parameters provided

parameters.title: Incident ID
parameters.name: incidentID
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Incident ID whose details you want to fetch
parameters.description: Specify the Incident ID whose details you want to fetch

operations.title: Get Incidents
operations.description: Retrieves all Incident details based on the parameters provided

parameters.title: Created After Date
parameters.name: createdAfterDate
parameters.tooltip: Retrieve incidents that were created after specified date, in ISO 8601 format (UTC)
parameters.description: Retrieve incidents that were created after specified date, in ISO 8601 format (UTC)

parameters.title: Created Before Date
parameters.name: createdBeforeDate
parameters.tooltip: Retrieve incidents that were created before specified date, in ISO 8601 format (UTC)
parameters.description: Retrieve incidents that were created before specified date, in ISO 8601 format (UTC)

parameters.title: Email Message ID
parameters.name: emailMessageID
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated value of multiple message-ids.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated value of multiple message-ids.

operations.title: Close Incidents
operations.description: Closes the Incident on the basis of given TRAP incident IDs

parameters.title: Incident IDs
parameters.name: incidentIDs
parameters.tooltip: Specify the comma separated values of Incidents IDs which you want to Close
parameters.description: Specify the comma separated values of Incidents IDs which you want to Close

parameters.title: Close Summary
parameters.name: closeSummary
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Closing summary to be placed into each closed incident.
parameters.description: Specify the Closing summary to be placed into each closed incident.

parameters.title: Close Detail
parameters.name: closeDetail
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Closing details to be placed into each closed incident.
parameters.description: Specify the Closing details to be placed into each closed incident.
